channel.title: Is It Possible TO Hang Out With Other People In Moparscape?
channel.description: me and my friend want to but we dont know how we try and go to the same place but it wont work :confused:

item.title: Is It Possible TO Hang Out With Other People In Moparscape?

item.title: Is It Possible TO Hang Out With Other People In Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @Informer Informer
item.description:
@Informer wrote:

To see other people in moparscape.what you do is go to "HELP"on the moparscape client when opened then go to “SERVER STATUS” and look at servers that are online then copy one then go to “FILE” on the Moparscape client and click "new server"then hit ctrl+v at the same time or ctrl then v and then click ok then go back to the server status page and look at the port then back to the client and go to file again then click new port and type in the port of the server
Example: Server IP:medievalfantasyscape.servegame.com Port:43594
Port 43594 is most common

Enjoy!

Read full topic
item.source: Is It Possible TO Hang Out With Other People In Moparscape?
